communities.name: New York City Bar Association
communities.description: The New York City Bar Association is a voluntary association of lawyers and law students.

communities.name: New York State Bar Association
communities.description: The New York State Bar Association is the largest voluntary state bar association in the nation.

communities.name: New York County Lawyers Association
communities.description: The New York County Lawyers Association is one of the oldest and largest bar associations in the country.

communities.name: Fordham University School of Law
communities.description: Fordham Law School is a leading law school in New York City, known for its strong programs in corporate law and international law.

communities.name: CUNY School of Law
communities.description: CUNY School of Law is a public law school in New York City, known for its public interest focus.

communities.name: NYU School of Law
communities.description: NYU School of Law is one of the nation's premier law schools, known for its innovative programs and global perspective.

communities.name: National Lawyers Guild - NYC Chapter
communities.description: The NLG-NYC is a progressive bar association dedicated to using law for the people, uniting lawyers, law students, legal workers, and jailhouse lawyers.

communities.name: Legal Services NYC
communities.description: Legal Services NYC is the largest provider of civil legal services for low-income New Yorkers.

communities.name: Lawyers Alliance
communities.description: Lawyers Alliance provides business and transactional legal services to nonprofits and social enterprises.

communities.name: Asian American Bar Association of New York
communities.description: AABANY is a professional membership organization of attorneys concerned with issues affecting the Asian Pacific American community.

communities.name: New York City Trial Lawyers Association
communities.description: NYCTLA is a professional organization dedicated to protecting the rights of injured victims and their families.

communities.name: Metropolitan Black Bar Association
communities.description: The Metropolitan Black Bar Association is a professional organization of Black attorneys in the New York City metropolitan area.
